name: Fidele Angel
description: A winged celestial being with a strong presence, the Fidele Angel is characterized by its loyalty and protective nature.
memorable: The ability to share damage with its mate highlights its deep bond and dedication.
goals: To protect and serve beings of good, supporting and advising them when needed.
relations: Often paired with another Fidele Angel, emphasizing themes of loyalty and devotion.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or places of goodness and order.
strengths: Exceptional physical and magical capabilities, immune to certain damage types, and magic resistance.
weaknesses: Relies on its mate and has limited mobility when grounded.
attacks: Capable of dealing slashing damage with its Longsword and Talons, and radiant damage with its Radiant Bolt.
most_powerful_ability: Ever Connected: shares damage taken with its paired angel, symbolizing their bond.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 16, indicating good awareness and detection skills.
skills: Proficient in Insight and Perception, allowing it to understand motives and notice hidden details.
additional_information: Immortal Nature: does not require food or sleep.
Can change shape to adapt to different situations.
Magic Weapons: can bypass many resistances with its attacks.
Can teleport to its mate regardless of distance.
Cast useful spells without needing material components.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like bless, cure wounds, and daylight, providing support to allies.
test_queries: angel that can teleport to its mate
devoted celestial being immune to charm
